metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25074 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high.
metadata.Description: The cache action in action/cache.py in MoinMoin through 1.9.10 allows directory traversal through a crafted HTTP request. An attacker who can upload attachments to the wiki can use this to achieve remote code execution.

criterions.comment: moin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
